ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:52:41 [Issue ID 4000-109387] urn:comicvine:4000-109387 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 00:44:01. [Issue ID 266354]
ComicInfo.Summary:
To borrow the tagline off the final issue of Peter Milligan's 'X-Statix': "Downbeat yet Strangely Moving Final Issue!" The universe is coming to an end and Mr. Gone is guiding each cast member into their next ideal outback reality.
Julie, Mark, Sara, Artie, Dave, and Gloria disappear from the world one by one; FBI agents, who have returned as giant sow bugs, shoots Artie in the head; In Pangea, the Jungle Queen and the Maxx see Artie and Sara, who are together at last; Dave and Dr. Pender work at the same community college; Julie and Mark live on a farm; Julie continues telling Mark about Megan.
ComicInfo.Title: Endings and Beginnings
